RobotiCode Customer End User License Agreement
Copyright 2010-2017 RobotiCode Ltd

IMPORTANT NOTICE: The 'Words of Jesus Each Day' software ("Software") is the copyright of RobotiCode Limited ("RobotiCode") whose principal place of business is at RobotiCode Ltd, AIMS, Office 4B, Britannia House, Penny Lane, Cowbridge, Vale of Glamorgan, CF71 7EG, UK. and may not be stored on any computer or copied without the license of RobotiCode. You are offered a license on the terms of the End User License Agreement ("EULA") set out below.

If you accept the terms of the License Agreement, select "Agree".

Selecting Agree and installing the Software constitutes acceptance of the terms of the EULA. Please read carefully and accept the terms and conditions of the EULA before installing or using the Software. Do not install or use the Software if you do not agree to the terms and conditions of the EULA.

If you do not accept these terms, please uninstall this Software. 

END USER LICENSE AGREEMENT ("EULA")

A. You are permitted to load or download the Software and use it on Android devices under your personal control.

B. You are not permitted:

1. to rent, lease, sub-license, loan, copy (except as expressly provided in this Agreement), modify adapt, merge, translate, reverse engineer, decompile, disassemble or create derivative works based on the whole or any part of the Software or its associated documentation except as permitted by law;

2. except as expressly provided in this Agreement, to use, reproduce or deal in the Software in any way.

C. TERM

The license is effective until you terminate it by uninstalling the Software together with all copies. It will also terminate if you fail to abide by this Agreement. Upon termination you agree to destroy all copies of the Software and its documentation including any Software stored on the media of any computer under your control.

D. OWNERSHIP

RobotiCode shall at all times retain ownership of the Software and all subsequent copies thereof regardless of form.

E. INCLUDED ONLINE ACCESS TO THIRD PARTY SOFTWARE

The Software may provide online access to third party software or content, e.g. Advertising Banners, which are offered by third parties online. The Software can only provide access to such software or content if your phone is connected to the Internet. If you agree to this EULA you agree that the Software may provide such access to third party software or content.

For clarification purposes: RobotiCode is not the owner of such third party software or content and RobotiCode waives any responsibility and/or liability for such third party software or content. In particular RobotiCode does not warrant any availability of such third party software or content.

F. WARRANTIES AND REMEDIES

1. RobotiCode does not warrant that the Software will meet your requirements or that the operation of the Software will be uninterrupted or error free or that all errors in the Software can be corrected. You load and use the Software at your own risk and in no event will RobotiCode or its Directors, employees or any individual associated with RobotiCode be liable to you for any loss or damage of any kind, including lost profits or any indirect or consequential loss arising from the use of or inability to use the Software or from errors or deficiencies in it whether caused by negligence or otherwise, except as expressly provided in this Agreement.

G. CONSUMERS

Nothing in this Agreement shall affect your statutory rights as a consumer.

H. LAW

This Agreement shall be governed by the law of England and Wales.

THIRD PARTY SOFTWARE

In all cases copyright is reserved by RobotiCode or its licensors and is protected by international copyright law.


If you have any questions concerning this Agreement please write to RobotiCode Limited using the following email address:  eula@roboticode.co.uk


Additional Privacy information:

Some basic information is used by the app to ensure that we give you the best experience possible.

We use a device identifier (which is like a unique number for your device) and location to personalise content and ads in the app. We also share such identifiers with our advertising partners, Google and Amazon.

Our website and other third-party websites linked from the app may also use cookies to personalise content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyse traffic. If you wish to turn off cookies, you can learn more here:

http://www.roboticode.co.uk/support/cookies
